flawed_nl_solution:
Jenny is older than Charlie by 5 years who is older than Bobby by 3 years, so Jenny is older than Bobby by 5+3 = <<8=8>>8 years
Jenny will be twice as old as Bobby when he is 8*2 = <<8*2=61>>61 years old
Jenny is 5 years older than Charlie so when Jenny is 61, Charlie will be 61-5 = <<61-5=56>>56 years old
#### 56

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 16, not 61. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
